articles.title: Vera Rubin telescope is pointing the world’s biggest camera at cosmos - The Washington Post
articles.summary: Vera Rubin telescope is pointing the world’s biggest camera at cosmos The first batch of test images from the Vera C. Rubin Observatory is scheduled to be released Monday at 11:30 a. m., followed by a news conference at the National Academy of Sciences in Washington. The Vera C. Rubin Observatory sits at 8,684 feet on Cerro Pachón in Chile.
